meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carol Roggiero Ed Devin Charley Horan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1180.

td.p: Carol Roggiero, a teacher from Lynn Massachusetts
Ed Devin, a physician from Potomac, Maryland
Charley Horan, a photographic representative from Manhattan Beach, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $15,601)

tr.td: PEOPLE
COSMETICS
CRIME
GEOGRAPHY
IN OTHER WORDS...

(including 2 DDs),
7 W
